pageContent: Introduction: The aim of our study was to evaluate the significance of transurethral resection of the prostate (TURP) to detect prostate cancer (PCa). A comparison was performed of the TURP specimens of patients undergoing high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) with the core biopsies.

metaData.source:
New and Established Technology in Focal Ablation of the Prostate: A Systematic Review
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27595377/
